Elements of Subcategory: Date of Birth, Username, Email Address, Telephone Number, Password
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We collect information that you provide when you set up an account, such as your date of birth, username, email address and/or telephone number, and password.

Elements of Subcategory: Bio, Profile Photo
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: You can add other information to your profile, such as a bio or a profile photo.

Elements of Subcategory: Photographs, Videos, Audio Recordings, Livestreams
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We collect the content you create or publish through the Platform, such as photographs, videos, audio recordings, livestreams

Elements of Subcategory: Comments, Hashtags, Feedback, Reviews
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We collect the content you create or publish through the Platform, such as comments, hashtags, feedback, reviews

Elements of Subcategory: Creation Time and Date, Location of Content Creation, Creator Identity
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We collect the associated metadata (such as when, where, and by whom the content was created).

Elements of Subcategory: Text, Images, and Videos from Device's Clipboard
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We also collect content (such as text, images, and video) from your device's clipboard if you choose to copy and paste content to or from the Platform or share content between it and a third party platform.

Elements of Subcategory: Tagged Locations in Posts (e.g., Tourist Attractions, Shops)
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: In addition, we collect location information (such as tourist attractions, shops, or other points of interest) if you choose to add the location information to your User Content.

Elements of Subcategory: Message Content, Timestamps, Participants
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: If you communicate with others using direct messages, we collect the content of the message and the associated metadata (such as the time the message was sent, received and/or read, as well as the participants in the communication).

Elements of Subcategory: Chat with Merchants, Virtual Assistant Interactions during Purchases
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We also collect the messages you send or receive through our chat functionality when communicating with merchants who sell goods to you, and your use of virtual assistants when purchasing items through the Platform.

Elements of Subcategory: Names from Phone Book, Phone Numbers, Email Addresses
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: If you choose to sync your contacts, we will collect information from your device’s phone book such as names, phone numbers, and email addresses

Elements of Subcategory: Public Profile Information from Social Networks, Names and Profiles of Social Network Contacts
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: If you choose to find other users through your social network contacts, we will collect your public profile information as well as names and profiles of your social network contacts.

Elements of Subcategory: Your Contact Information Synced by Other Users
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We may also receive contact information that you hold or is held about you when contact information is synced with our Platform by you or another user.

Elements of Subcategory: Payment Card Details, Billing Information
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We collect information about the purchase or payment transaction, such as payment card information, billing

Elements of Subcategory: Items Purchased
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: we collect information about the purchase or payment transaction, such as payment card information, billing, delivery, and contact information, and items you purchased.

Elements of Subcategory: Shipping Address, Delivery Status
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: we collect information about the purchase or payment transaction, such as payment card information, billing, delivery, and contact information

Elements of Subcategory: Inquiries, Feedback or Reports, Policy Violation Reports
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: When you contact us, we collect the information you send us, such as proof of identity or age, feedback or inquiries about your use of the Platform or information about possible violations of our Terms of Service

Elements of Subcategory: Information entered into forms on the Platform
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We collect the Information You Provide when you fill in a form on the Platform.

Elements of Subcategory: Device Model, Operating System, System Language, Device Identifiers (Device ID)
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We collect certain device and network connection information when you access the Platform. This information includes your device model, operating system.

Elements of Subcategory: Device Model, Operating System, System Language, Device Identifiers (Device ID)
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We automatically assign you a device ID and user ID.

Elements of Subcategory: Crash Reports, Performance Logs, Keystroke Patterns or Rhythms
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We also collect service-related, diagnostic, and performance information, including crash reports and performance logs.

Elements of Subcategory: IP Address
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We collect certain device and network connection information when you access the Platform. This information includes your device model, operating system, keystroke patterns or rhythms, IP address, and system language.

Elements of Subcategory: Based on IP Address, Based on SIM Card Data
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We automatically collect information about your approximate location (e.g., country, state, or city) based on your Technical Information (such as SIM card and IP address).

Elements of Subcategory: GPS Data from Device Location Services
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: Also, where you enable location services for the TikTok app within your device settings, we collect approximate location information from your device.

Elements of Subcategory: Content Viewed, Duration and Frequency of Use, Interactions with Other Users
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We collect information about how you engage with the Platform, including information about the content you view, the duration and frequency of your use, your engagement with other users

Elements of Subcategory: Search Queries, Browsing History
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We collect information about how you engage with the Platform, including information about the content you view, the duration and frequency of your use, your engagement with other users, your search history and your settings.

Elements of Subcategory: Age Range, Gender, Interests and Preferences
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We infer your attributes (such as age-range and gender) and interests based on the information we have about you.

Elements of Subcategory: Object and Scenery Recognition in Media, Facial and Body Part Detection, Speech-to-Text Transcriptions
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We detect and collect characteristics and features about the videos, images, and audio recordings that are part of your User Content

Elements of Subcategory: Cookie Identifiers, Session Tokens
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to operate and provide the Platform.

Elements of Subcategory: Web Beacons, Pixel Tags
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to operate and provide the Platform. For example, we use cookies to remember your language preferences, make sure you don’t see the same video more than once, and for security purposes. We also use these technologies for marketing purposes.

Elements of Subcategory: Activities on Other Websites and Apps, Products or Services Purchased Elsewhere, Mobile Advertising Identifiers
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: Advertisers, measurement and other partners share information with us about you and the actions you have taken outside of the Platform

Elements of Subcategory: Data from TikTok Sign-In on Other Platforms, Interactions via TikTok Developer Tools
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: Third party platforms provide us with information (such as your email address, user ID, and public profile) when you choose to sign up for or log in to the Platform using sign-in features provided by those third parties.

Elements of Subcategory: Data from TikTok Sign-In on Other Platforms, Interactions via TikTok Developer Tools
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: When you interact with any third party service (such as third party apps, websites or products) that integrate TikTok Developer Tools, we will receive the information necessary to provide you with features like cross-service authentication or cross-posting.

Elements of Subcategory: Publicly Available Information, Data from Government or Professional Organizations, Information from Charities or Businesses
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We may collect or receive information about you from organisations, businesses, people, and others, including, for example, publicly available sources, government authorities, professional organisations, and charity groups.

Elements of Subcategory: Information About You in Other Users' Content or Messages
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We also collect information about you where you are included or mentioned in User Content, Direct Messages

We use your information to allow you to access and use the Platform, including allowing you to create and consume content, interact with others, utilise social features, and provide you with products and services you purchase. We also personalise certain features and content on the Platform, such as providing your 'For You' feed.

Target: Purchase Details, Payment Information, Delivery Information
Subcategory Name: Purchase Details, Payment Information, Delivery Information
Elements of Subcategory: Items Purchased, Payment Card Details, Shipping Address
Specific Text from Privacy Policy: We use your information to process orders, such as to facilitate the purchase and delivery of products, and communicate with you about your orders. This includes sharing Purchase Information with Merchants, Payment and Transaction Fulfilment Providers, and Other Service Providers.

We use your information to enforce our Terms, Guidelines, and policies (including through automated means and human moderation). This may include age restricting mature content, maintaining our For You feed eligibility standards, removing content or suspending or banning your account if we determine that you are violating our Terms or Guidelines.

We use the information we have to administer the Platform, such as to communicate with you on service-related matters, provide you with updates and support regarding any purchase you make on or through the Platform, and respond to and process your queries, claims or disputes.

We use your information to ensure the safety and well-being of our community, including by reviewing User Content (and if permitted under applicable law, Direct Messages and associated metadata) for breaches of our Terms, Guidelines, and other policies.

We use your information to ensure the stability and security of the Platform, including by identifying and combating technical or security issues (such as technical bugs, spam accounts, and detecting abuse, fraud, and illegal activity).

We use the information we have to understand how people are using the Platform and to develop, test, and make improvements to the Platform, including to develop and improve our technology, such as our machine learning models and algorithms.

We may send you direct marketing messages about features of the Platform and third-party services that we think will interest you. We may also send you promotions, contests, or marketing campaigns or event information.
